mapper.select: SELECT sj.id, sj.create_time, sj.modify_time, sj.name, sj.quxiang_money, sj.description, sj.type, sj.begin_time, sj.end_time, sjh.id history_id, sjh.create_time history_create_time, sjh.modify_time history_modify_time, sjh.user_id FROM service_job sj LEFT JOIN service_job_history sjh ON sj.id = sjh.job_id WHERE sj.type = 0 AND sjh.user_id = #{userId} AND sj.begin_time < now() AND sj.end_time > now()
